experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Fullstack lead engineer designing and developing Java distributed web applications on the cloud and supporting legacy BAU applications.

projects.description: Design, build and support entity REST API web services using Spring.
Integrate entity API adoption into Spring backend services.
Design and build data sync application between distributed database and Stratus using Spring, Kafka and Attunity.
Design, build and support configurable both Identity Provider and Service Provider Single Sign On using SAML 2.0.
Design, build and support cross application communication between distributed Java and Stratus COBOL environments using Spring Integration(TCP) and IBM RAD J2C plugin.
Assist in designing and implementing lift and shit projects re: integration between the two companies.
Document and host design and architecture sessions on aforementioned technologies to team.
Support a legacy WebSphere Java 4 web application.
Dabbled lightly in the dark arts of React.

experience.title: Software Engineer I/II
experience.description: Fullstack engineer working on Spring applications using Java 7/8 with SQL Server 2012.

projects.description: Design, build, and support product which processed 835 EDI files with bill information through a rules and pricing engine before adjudication via web service. Created scheduled jobs to check adjudication status for post processing and create 997/824 files to send back to vendor.
Enhance and maintain internal/external portal web application and file processing engine.
Enhance web service REST API by implementing caching using Spring.
On-call support and participate in deployments.
Document technical and business processes to share with team.

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description: Distributed applications for ACH. Majority of applications were internal and built on Java 6 with Spring, MSSQL 08/12 and HP SQLMX.

projects.description: Design, develop, and maintain Java web applications using Spring to process transactions from batch files for processing and creating data feeds.
Support .NET applications for automated file moving/processing and self service server management.
Automate deployment process using Jenkins pipeline and shell scripts.

experience.title: Educational Technician
experience.description: Develop single page static content for online courses using HTML/CSS/jQuery; Create graphics in Photoshop; Video edit lectures.

degree.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

volunteering.title: Mentor
volunteering.description: Educating the future generation on coding using HTML, CSS and Javascript.
